title: Intensive Short-Term Course on PLC Technology Fundamentals and Applications

context.additional_context: A practical-oriented PLC technology training course for in-service professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain the basic components and operating principles of a PLC (Professional Learning Community).
Learners can design simple control circuits using Ladder Logic.
Learners can analyze PLC control cases applied in actual industrial settings.
Learners can enhance learning efficiency by 30% or more by linking e-learning content with real-time practical training in a blended learning environment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
